name: EZ dev

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara:
My name is Eliasz, and I am a Front-End Engineer. I embarked on my journey in Software Development in 2021. Since then, I have been dedicated to creating high-quality web applications, primarily using React and React Native.

In my work, I strive to create intuitive and visually appealing interfaces that not only meet modern standards but also exceed user expectations. My experience spans both web and mobile app development, allowing me to deliver seamless and consistent user experiences across different platforms.

I believe in the power of collaboration and always focus on achieving team success rather than individual accomplishments. Working in a cohesive team environment drives innovation and leads to better results. I am passionate about continuous learning and keeping up with the latest trends and technologies to ensure that the solutions I provide are cutting-edge and effective.

In addition to my technical skills, I am adept at problem-solving and have a keen eye for detail, which helps me to identify and resolve issues efficiently. I am committed to writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices to ensure the longevity and scalability of the projects I work on.
